SN0: 04 0000 0100
SN1: BE 1011 1110
SN2: 6F 0110 1111
CT : 88 1000 1000 (FIXED)
B0 : 5D 0101 1101 (XOR)


SN3: 22 0010 0010
SN4: 09 0000 1001
SN5: 29 0010 1001
SN6: 80 1000 0000
B1 : 82 1000 0010 (XOR)


LSB->MSB
PARITY: If odd # of 1s: 0, else 1
CRC: 16 bits, init value 6363

FROM Reader:
0
0110
010
0
for 26 (REQA - 7 bit)


Response to REQA/WUPA command - Fixed response

1 <- start bit
0010 0010 44
1 <- parity
0000 0000 00
1 <- parity






FROM READER ANTICOLLISION LEVEL 1: 93 20
0
1100 1001 93
1
0000 0100 20
0
0

Response to ANTICOLLISION Level 1 - 88 SN0 SN1 SN2 BCC1

1
0001 0001 88 
1
0010 0000 04
0
0111 1101 BE
1
1111 0110 6F
1 
1011 1010 5D
0
